title: Whole30 Baked Cod with Tomato & Olives
description: A bright, Mediterranean-style baked cod finished with stewed tomatoes, briny olives, and fresh herbs. Quick to assemble and oven-baked for a moist, flaky fillet that pairs well with roasted vegetables or cauliflower rice.

ingredients.display_name: cherry tomatoes, halved (or diced canned tomatoes drained)

ingredients.notes: about 1 tbsp juice and 1 tsp zest
adjust to taste (remember olives and capers are salty)

ingredients.display_name: anchovy fillet, finely chopped (optional for umami but omit for strict whole30 if avoiding)

steps.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). Lightly oil a shallow baking dish large enough to hold the fillets in a single layer.
Heat half the olive oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and a pinch of salt and sweat until translucent, about 5 minutes.
Add the minced garlic (and chopped anchovy if using) to the skillet and sauté for 30–45 seconds until fragrant, stirring constantly so the garlic does not brown.

Stir in the halved cherry tomatoes, olives, and capers. Add dried oregano, red pepper flakes if using, and half of the lemon zest. Cook, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes begin to soften and release juices, about 5 minutes. Taste and adjust seasoning.
Transfer the tomato-olive mixture to the prepared baking dish and spread into an even layer. Drizzle with a tablespoon of olive oil and make small indentations for the cod fillets.

Season the cod fillets lightly with salt and pepper and place them on top of the tomato-olive bed. Spoon a little of the sauce over each fillet, drizzle with remaining olive oil, and squeeze the lemon juice evenly over the fish.
Bake in the preheated oven until the cod is opaque and flakes easily with a fork, about 10–12 minutes depending on thickness (thicker fillets may require up to 14 minutes).
Remove from oven, sprinkle with remaining lemon zest and chopped parsley, and let rest 2 minutes before serving. Serve with roasted vegetables or cauliflower rice for a Whole30-compliant meal.
